inclusion.criterion: De novo glioblastoma multiforme, anaplastic astrocytoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate bone marrow reserve(hemoglobin > 10 grams, Absolute neutrophil count > 1500 / mm3, platelets > 100,000/ mm3)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal renal function(BUN < 24 mg/dL, Creatinine < 1.3 mg/dL)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal liver function(Total Bilirubin < 1.5 mg/dL, SGPT/ALT < 60 U/L)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Have a Karnofsky score of < 60 [Appendix B] or age < 18 years.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy of their glioblastomamultiforme, anaplastic astrocytoma, anaplastic oligodendrogliomas, mixed anaplastic oligoastrocytomas, gliosarcoma.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Tumors located in the brainstem or optic chiasm.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior radiation therapy to the brain
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior chemotherapy within the past 6 weeks.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 45-year-old man with a history of anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention s/p Foley catheter, high-dose steroids, hypertension, and chronic pain.
